Lettings

Models

Model representing a physical address.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class lettings.models.Letting(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Model representing a property letting.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Views

lettings.views.index(request)[source]

View for displaying a list of all lettings. Retrieves all the Letting objects from the database and passes them to the ‘lettings/index.html’ template. Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template.

lettings.views.letting(request, letting_id)[source]

View for displaying the details of a specific letting. Retrieves a Letting object based on the given letting_id and passes its details to the ‘lettings/letting.html’ template. Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request. letting_id: ID of the Letting object to retrieve.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template.

Tests

class lettings.tests.LettingTestCases(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test cases for lettings:index, list views and models. Every test assert the correct status code, the template used and the context content.

setUp()[source]

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.
